tool_description: A Scuba diving trivia questions API that comes in 3 categories. Each category has 5 questions, and the answers are in multiple choices format.
title: Scuba Diving Quiz version 101

api_list.name: Scuba diving emergency questions
api_list.description: This endpoint will return 5 questions and answers from Scuba diving "emergency" category.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://scuba-diving-quiz-version-101.p.rapidapi.com/trivia/emergency"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "scuba-diving-quiz-version-101.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all questions
api_list.description:
This endpoint will return all scuba diving questions from 3 categories:
- Refresher
- Acronym
- Emergency
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://scuba-diving-quiz-version-101.p.rapidapi.com/trivia"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "scuba-diving-quiz-version-101.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
